identity.name: Structural Integrity
identity.core_metaphor: The Digital Site Office - Organized, Sturdy, Precise

secondary.name: Safety Orange
secondary.usage: Call to Actions, Alerts, Highlights, Progress Bars

gradients.exception: Subtle vertical gradient on sidebar only (Slate-900 to Slate-950)

buttons.style: Sharp edges or minimal radius (2px). High contrast.
buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 hover:shadow-md transition-all active:translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:border-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50

cards.style: Flat white surface, subtle border, 'Technical' shadow on hover.
cards.classes: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-md p-6 hover:border-slate-300 transition-colors

inputs.style: Rectangular, distinct borders, no soft glows.
inputs.classes: rounded-sm border-slate-300 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-900 focus:border-transparent bg-slate-50

navigation.sidebar: bg-slate-900 text-slate-300 w-64 fixed h-full border-r border-slate-800

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grid pattern (graph paper) on dashboard background.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Buttons press down (scale-95). Cards lift up (-translate-y-1).

accessibility.contrast: WCAG AA Compliant. Dark text on light backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible 2px offset ring in Safety Orange or Steel Blue.

hero_background.usage: Login page background, Landing page hero

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px, sharp joins if possible

steps: 2. Configure Tailwind colors (slate-900 as primary, orange-600 as secondary)
4. Build 'ProjectCard' component with the technical shadow style
5. Implement 'GanttChart' using a library or custom grid
6. Ensure all inputs have data-testid attributes
universal_rules: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds.
Do NOT use rounded-full for buttons (use rounded-sm).
Use 'Safety Orange' sparingly for high-priority actions only.
